entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 04:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of rain mixed with wet snow beginning this evening except periods of wet snow over higher terrain. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow ending in the morning then cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
